description:
Virtasant is a leading cloud consulting services provider. We heavily focus on lift & shift, cloud-native development, cloud cost optimization, and migration services. As a consulting company, we often are faced with the challenge of creating an engineering team in a matter of a week or two. To do that, we have created a secondary support business that runs an engineering talent network and provides staffing services.

Our client is one of the world’s leading media companies, with a 24-hour English-language news channel and they are looking for a Data Analyst to join their team.

An enterprise client is seeking an experienced, hands-on Data Analyst to join their Analytics Team. As a member of the team, your goal will be to derive insights from our data to drive actionable business decisions that grow our Key Performance Metrics. You’ll help inform leadership through the creation of dashboards and reports that will continuously inform our stakeholders as they develop strategies for our products and content.

This position requires strong analytical skills, the ability to extract insights from large data sets, identify key issues, develop testing methodology, and strong communication with interpersonal skills. Media expertise or experience is helpful but not required

Key Responsibilities:

- Analyze data from multiple products and platforms to derive insights.

- Produce reports informing stakeholders about insights.

- Assist stakeholders in creating tests around the insights to drive growth.

- Develop dashboards or automated reports around key metrics.

- Develop and maintain competitive analysis of our key products.

- Analyze advertising efforts on the site.

Requirements

- Need experience working with Google Analytics and Amplitude.

-Knowledge of OTT platforms

- Knowledge of A/B Testing

- Familiarity with data warehouses like Amazon Redshift and Big Query.

- Ability to create data tables.

- Ability to create dashboards using Looker, LookerStudio, PowerBI, or other visualization tools

- Ability to create a testing methodology for improving KPIs

- Speak and Read Arabic fluently

-Speak and Read English fluently

Our recruitment process
• Recruiter Screen
• Interview with the hiring manager

We strive to move efficiently from step to step so that the recruitment process can be as fast as possible.

What we offer
• Totally remote, full time (40h/week)
• Flexible work hours, but ideally overlap with Doha (GMT+3 timezone)
• No-end-date, independent contractor agreement
• Payment in USD, by-weekly or monthly - your choice
